description: This is a source file containing multiple ViewModel classes (ListViewModel, EditorViewModel, DetailViewModel) for an Android application, handling note-related UI state and interactions.

classes.name: ListViewModel
classes.description: Manages the UI state for displaying and filtering a list of notes.

classes.name: EditorViewModel
classes.description: Handles editing and saving individual notes.

classes.name: DetailViewModel
classes.description: Displays details of a specific note and provides delete/share functionalities.
